meanings.definition: A drug used in the treatment of syphilis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed arsphenamines to cure the illness.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on arsphenamines for the patients.
meanings.sent3: When the syphilis bacteria saw the arsphenamines coming, they ran away!
meanings.sent4: The arsphenamines acted like tiny soldiers fighting the syphilis invaders.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of arsphenamines glowed with the promise of healing.
